title: MCServer WatchCat
desc: Observe Minecraft server online players at any time, anywhere.
server-port: Server port | If the server ip has included a port number, pls don't input here.
server-offline: ( •́ _ •̀)？ Meow, server not found, are you forget start the server?
no-players: ∑(￣□￣;) Wow, no online players now meow!
add-server: Add server to my bedrock client | Pls make sure the server was allowed bedrock player to join and the port is 19132.
bedrock-player-use-geyser-icon: Use Geyser icon for Bedrock players
